reviewText: This movie is so bad whoever directed this must've been drinking while he made it because it is just awful. Hope my English is good enough for this review too
This movie is the best movie ever! Coach Robbie is the best director ever!

A Proper Violence is imaginative, engaging, well-acted and, altogether, a very exciting and well-done movie. The story line is very well-scripted, and just enough of character and motivation is left for the viewer to wonder about. I recommend this movie highly.
  Hugh O'Connor

Great indie suspense drama that will keep you on the edge of your seat.  You will find yourself talking about the alternatives and motivations that lead to a riveting conclusion of this can't miss release.  Acting is first rate and the artistic cinematography enhances the experience!
